DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Physician Patient Knowledge Safety Safe Use Information Aflibercept
DOC.criteria: Physicians eligibility : Licensed practice ophthalmologist Prescribed administer aflibercept least one patient past 6 month Patients eligibility : Patient administer aflibercept least within last 6 month indication return subsequent visit . Patient age 18 year old . Patient able understand sign consent form patient questionnaire . Patient understand native language country study conduct . Patient participate clinical trial treatment aflibercept indication ( e.g. , wAMD , CRVO , DME ) past 12 month .
